body_html:
The error message is quite self descriptive. You're returning a Tensor from backward, while you should have returned a Variable. If you want to return a tensor add @once_differentiable.

Note that we're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on our forums.
body_text:
The error message is quite self descriptive. You're returning a Tensor from backward, while you should have returned a Variable. If you want to return a tensor add @once_differentiable.
Note that we're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on our forums.
body:
The error message is quite self descriptive. You're returning a Tensor from `backward`, while you should have returned a Variable. If you want to return a tensor add `@once_differentiable`.

Note that we're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on [our forums](discuss.pytorch.org).
